introduce.label: Introduce

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use TwitterDown
usage.description: Download any Twitter video in four simple steps:

items.title: Find the Tweet
items.description: Find the tweet that contains the video you want to download on Twitter.

items.title: Copy the Link
items.description: Click the share icon and select "Copy Link" to copy the tweet link.

items.title: Paste & Parse
items.description: Paste the tweet link into TwitterDown's input box and click the "Download" button.

items.title: Select Format & Download
items.description: Choose your preferred MP4 format and quality, then download to your device.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of TwitterDown
feature.description: Simple and efficient Twitter video downloader to meet all your needs.

items.title: Fast Parsing
items.description: Intelligently parse Twitter video links and get download addresses within seconds.

items.title: Quality Selection
items.description: Support multiple quality options, from standard to high-definition HD, meeting different needs and storage space.

items.title: High-Speed Downloads
items.description: Optimized download servers ensure the fastest download speeds, saving your precious time.

items.title: MP4 Format Downloads
items.description: Professional MP4 format downloads compatible with all devices and platforms, ensuring the best playback experience.

items.title: Batch Downloads
items.description: Advanced users can batch process multiple Twitter videos, greatly improving work efficiency.

items.title: Completely Free
items.description: No account registration required, completely free to use with no hidden fees or usage restrictions.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team for assistance.

items.title: Is it legal to download Twitter videos?
items.description: TwitterDown is designed for personal use. While downloading videos for personal viewing is generally acceptable, please respect copyright laws and the original creator's rights. Do not republish or monetize content without proper permission.

items.title: Do I need a Twitter account to use TwitterDown?
items.description: No, you don't need a Twitter account to use TwitterDown. Simply copy the URL of the video you want to download and paste it into our tool.

items.title: What video formats does TwitterDown support?
items.description: TwitterDown supports MP4 format downloads, which is the most universal and compatible video format that works on all devices and platforms.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many videos I can download?
items.description: Free users can download up to 5 videos per day. Pro users can perform batch downloads. Business users enjoy completely unlimited downloads with no restrictions.

items.title: Can I download private Twitter videos?
items.description: No, TwitterDown can only download publicly available videos. Videos from private accounts or direct messages cannot be accessed.

items.title: How do I choose the right video quality?
items.description: You can select quality based on your needs: HD is perfect for archiving and editing, while standard quality is ideal for quick previews and saving storage space. We offer multiple resolution options for you to choose from.
